title: What are extensions?
summary: An extension adds features and functions to a browser. It's created using familiar web-based technologies â€” HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It can take advantage of the same web APIs as JavaScript on a web page, but an extension also has access to its own set of JavaScript APIs. This means that you can do a lot more in an extension than you can with code in a web page. Here are just a few examples of the things you can do:
